original_solution_mapping.L1: For 6 months, Shara was able to return $10 x 6 = $<<10*6=60>>60 to her brother.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Since she already returned half of the money, then this means she currently owes her brother $<<60=60>>60.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Four months from now, she will be able to pay an additional $10 x 4 = $<<10*4=40>>40.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, she will still owe her brother $60 - $40 = $<<60-40=20>>20 four months from now.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1472.
    Returns: the amount Shara will still owe her brother.
    """
    # L1
    amount_per_month = 10 # returned $10 per month
    months_returned = 6 # 6 months ago
    total_returned_so_far = amount_per_month * months_returned

    # L2
    amount_currently_owed = total_returned_so_far

    # L3
    months_from_now = 4 # 4 months from now
    additional_payment = amount_per_month * months_from_now

    # L4
    remaining_debt = amount_currently_owed - additional_payment

    # FA
    answer = remaining_debt
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: For {months_returned} months, Shara was able to return ${amount_per_month} x {months_returned} = $<<{amount_per_month}*{months_returned}={total_returned_so_far}>>{total_returned_so_far} to her brother.
Since she already returned half of the money, then this means she currently owes her brother $<<{total_returned_so_far}={amount_currently_owed}>>{amount_currently_owed}.
Four months from now, she will be able to pay an additional ${amount_per_month} x {months_from_now} = $<<{amount_per_month}*{months_from_now}={additional_payment}>>{additional_payment}.
Thus, she will still owe her brother ${amount_currently_owed} - ${additional_payment} = $<<{amount_currently_owed}-{additional_payment}={remaining_debt}>>{remaining_debt} four months from now.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: For 6 months, Shara was able to return $10 x 6 = $<<10*6=60>>60 to her brother.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Since she already returned half of the money, then this means she currently owes her brother $<<60=60>>60.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Four months from now, she will be able to pay an additional $10 x 4 = $<<10*4=40>>40.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Thus, she will still owe her brother $60 - $4 = $<<60-4=56>>56 four months from now.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'months_from_now' (value: 4) was used instead of 'additional_payment' (value: 40).
